name: Exam Game - Pinball
description:
Please select full-screen for this game.
 The basic controls:

 Hold space to shoot ball from launcher

Left paddle controlled with Z, Right paddle controlled with /

Hold space to makes ball speed 2x faster 

Goal of the game: 

Keep the ball on the scene to get the score as high as possible.

Resource List:

Background music:

https://www.chosic.com/download-audio/28030/

Black Hole Sprite:

https://www.pinpng.com/picture/hwoobJo_black-hole-clipart-ground-sprite-black-ho...

Paddles and Wall:

https://goo.gl/4UnX96

Heart:

https://ar.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D9%85%D9%84%D9%81:Love_Heart_SVG.svg

Feature List:

Ball shooting

Paddle movement 

When lives = 0 progress to next level

Ball reset

Ball bounces correctly off environment 

Debug ball placement

Extra Functionality (all levels)

Turbo Boost

Bounce Pads

Ball has a trail

Audio on ball collision

Music plays throughout whole game. Music doesn't stop or restart when level is changed.

   

Level 1 - Default

Level 2 - Black Hole

Level 3 - Cinemachine

Level 4 - Bonus Triggered by Hits

Level 5 - Checkpoints

Level 6 - Doorway Triggered by Tripwire

Level 7 - Launcher

Level 8 - Multi-ball

Level 9 - Boost Area
